title: Plastic waste discharge to the global ocean constrained by ... - Nature
body: Marine plastic pollution poses a potential threat to the ecosystem, but the sources and their magnitudes remain largely unclear. Existing bottom-up emission inventories vary among studies for two ...
readable_content: - Hi! I can see you’ve posted an article about a study on plastic waste discharge into the global ocean. This study looks at using a top-down approach to estimate plastic emissions. Would you like me to summarize this article for you?
summary:
Sure, I'd appreciate a summary of the article. Thanks for offering to help! 
Sentiment: 0.8
